name: SuperSonic JetPackPals
description:
Jump in with you and a friend! Smash each others heads in a fast-paced action game with an awesome art style and silly soundtrack!

Player 1 Controls

W - Jump/Jetpack

A/D - Left/Right

S - Dash downward

Player 2 Controls

Up Arrow - Jump/Jetpack

A/D - Left/Right

S - Dash Downward
